document_data.caption: A pair of riding boots.
document_data.name: Riding Boots
document_data.mainbody: '''Riding boots''' were a variety of [[boots]] designed to be worn while riding a [[mount]]. They were commonly seen in both the lands of [[Faer√ªn]] and [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: A riding boot was typically constructed from stiffened leather. Some were designed with a break away strap system, allowing one to sheathe a [[short sword]] against their calf, while others had a sheath within their cuffs for concealing [[dagger]]s or [[stiletto]]s.
document_data.Availability:
* ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold riding boots made of either black or brown leather and with the common weapon sheathing strap system if desired.
* [[Cormyr]]<ref>
* In the city of [[Raven's Bluff]], riding boots could be found for sale at [[Tym's Supple Leather Shoppe]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/39/The Living City: Tym's Supple Leather Shoppe}}
* In the bazaars of Zakhara, riding boots could generally be bought for around five to two [[gold piece]]s, depending upon how well one haggled.
document_data.History: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], leather riding boots that reached up to the thighs were fashionable footwear among men in [[Waterdeep]].
